  "title": "Social Media & Marketing Assistant",
  "description": "Avocado Virtual Solutions (AVS) is a professional virtual assistance and business support service dedicated to helping entrepreneurs, small businesses, and busy professionals streamline their operations. We specialize in administrative support, customer service, social media management, recruitment assistance with onboarding, and business/company branding. Our mission is to help clients save time, enhance productivity, and build strong, recognizable brands while they focus on growing their businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media &amp; Marketing Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Remote
Employment Type: Full-time

Overview


	We&rsquo;re hiring a creative, organized, and tech-savvy Social Media &amp; Marketing Assistant to support a Licensed Financial Insurance Advisor and Consultant.
	The ideal candidate will manage her online presence, create high-quality video and graphic content, handle engagement, and ensure consistent visibility across platforms to attract and retain clients.


Key Responsibilities


	Create and edit high-quality, converting videos (minimum 3 per week) to promote financial education and services.
	Design visually appealing graphics, carousels, and presentation slides for social media and webinars.
	Manage and grow social media pages through consistent posting, engagement, and storytelling.
	Repurpose video materials into multiple content formats (shorts, reels, posts).
	Plan, promote, and assist in hosting one webinar monthly (setup, invites, reminders, and follow-up).
	Send meeting reminders and appointment reminders to clients.
	Monitor social media insights and recommend improvements to boost visibility and engagement.
	Collaborate closely with the Advisor to ensure all content aligns with her brand voice and message.


Requirements


	Proven experience in social media management, video editing, and graphics design.
	Proficiency in Canva, CapCut, or similar design and editing tools.
	Strong understanding of content marketing and audience engagement.
	Excellent written and verbal English communication.
	Reliable, detail-oriented, and self-motivated.
	Comfortable working remotely and within the Canadian time zone.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications and CV to:&nbsp;avsabujacareer@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail and tell us why they are fit for this role on the body of the mail.",

Social Media & Marketing Assistant Job at Avocado Virtual Solutions




        
    

        
        Avocado Virtual Solutions (AVS) is a professional virtual assistance and business support service dedicated to helping entrepreneurs, small businesses, and busy professionals streamline their operations. We specialize in administrative support, customer service, social media management, recruitment assistance with onboarding, and business/company branding. Our mission is to help clients save time, enhance productivity, and build strong, recognizable brands while they focus on growing their businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media & Marketing Assistant

Job Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time

Overview
     

            
    




	We’re hiring a creative, organized, and tech-savvy Social Media & Marketing Assistant to support a Licensed Financial Insurance Advisor and Consultant.
	The ideal candidate will manage her online presence, create high-quality video and graphic content, handle engagement, and ensure consistent visibility across platforms to attract and retain clients.


Key Responsibilities


	Create and edit high-quality, converting videos (minimum 3 per week) to promote financial education and services.
	Design visually appealing graphics, carousels, and presentation slides for social media and webinars.
	Manage and grow social media pages through consistent posting, engagement, and storytelling.
	Repurpose video materials into multiple content formats (shorts, reels, posts).
	Plan, promote, and assist in hosting one webinar monthly (setup, invites, reminders, and follow-up).
	Send meeting reminders and appointment reminders to clients.
	Monitor social media insights and recommend improvements to boost visibility and engagement.
	Collaborate closely with the Advisor to ensure all content aligns with her brand voice and message.


Requirements


	Proven experience in social media management, video editing, and graphics design.
	Proficiency in Canva, CapCut, or similar design and editing tools.
	Strong understanding of content marketing and audience engagement.
	Excellent written and verbal English communication.
	Reliable, detail-oriented, and self-motivated.
	Comfortable working remotely and within the Canadian time zone.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications and CV to: avsabujacareer@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail and tell us why they are fit for this role on the body of the mail.
